content:
I noticed, that the lint append_instead_of_extend was misnamed. It should be extend_instead_of_append to work when used with allow. We can just rename it without marking it as renamed, since it didn't hit stable yet, but we would then have to backport that rename to beta.

Thoughts? Maybe also a different/better name while we're at it?
Rename now sounds good. For a name, drain_extend? It looks like this can apply to other collections too, and most drain methods do not take a range.
I'm also in favor of renaming the lint now in beta and back porting it, Cameron Steffen's suggestion of extend_with_drain is very nice IMO
Ok I'll rename both during the sync on Thursday :+1:üèª thanks for the suggestions
